column10: Vehicles on Eastbound Weirich Rd can not see trail users on northbound West Side of Olley Ln.   The bushes on the SW corner of Weirich Rd and Olley lane completely obstruct the line of sight of the trail/sidewalk.  When pedestrians or cyclists come to a complete stop they can not see if there are vehicles approaching the intersection of Weirich Rd and the trail paralleling Olley lane.   School children are walking on this path every day and the intersection is extremely dangerous
